friendLines.title: Hello
friendLines.description: Welcome, weary Traveler from afar. Nights in the desert are cruel. You should rest here tonight. Sleep soundly, and know that I am watching over you.

friendLines.title: Chat: Spear and Shield
friendLines.description: A shield is not enough to protect the most important things. That's why I must also wield a spear.

friendLines.title: Chat: Life
friendLines.description: Peace and good health should be enjoyed by all... If I can provide everyone with a life such as this, I will be content.

friendLines.title: Chat: Wishes
friendLines.description: I will always seek to protect the things that are most important, no matter what it takes... even when it looks futile.

friendLines.title: When It Rains
friendLines.description: Stay warm, or you'll catch a cold.

friendLines.title: When Thunder Strikes
friendLines.description: The thunder rumbles — does it scare you?

friendLines.title: When It Snows
friendLines.description: This strange powder, it is... fine, like sand, but white as the clouds, and cold as ice...

friendLines.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
friendLines.description: In the desert, a strong gale like this will create a sandstorm, so it's always a good idea to stay alert.

friendLines.title: In the Desert
friendLines.description: I am right by your side. But if you're still nervous, just take my hand.

friendLines.title: Good Morning
friendLines.description: Good morning, Traveler. Did you sleep soundly last night?

friendLines.title: Good Afternoon
friendLines.description: It's already noon. The golden eye of the sky glares down fiercely at this hour... Hehe, we should find some shade and escape its wrath.

friendLines.title: Good Evening
friendLines.description: The night sky... that great canopy that descends when the light of day is gone. Who knows how many untold secrets it conceals...

friendLines.title: Good Night
friendLines.description: Yes, it's time to rest. You should sleep. Me? It's still much too early. The night is beautiful, but it's also full of danger... I must keep watch, for your sake.

friendLines.title: About Candace: Eye Color
friendLines.description: ...Strange? I'm not sure what you mean, both amber and blue are fairly common eye colors, I believe...

friendLines.title: About Candace: Aaru Village
friendLines.description: Aaru Village is where I was born and grew up. Even back when I was too young to understand anything else about the world, the one thing I knew for sure was that one day, I would take over from my grandfather as sworn protector of our village... Today, I am grateful to now hold this duty. It is what I was born to do.

friendLines.title: About Candace: Parents
friendLines.description: My father was a scholar from the Akademiya. He originally came to Aaru Village on a research trip, and then he met my mother... As for her, unfortunately I only know what my father has told me. The day I was born, she began her journey into the eternal night...

friendLines.title: About Us: Hosting Guests
friendLines.description: You will always be an honored guest of Aaru Village, no matter the day or time of your visit. If ever you tire of your journey, know that here, you can always find rest. Aaru Village welcomes you with open arms... as do I.

unlockConditions.unlockText: Complete "King Deshret and the Three Magi"

friendLines.title: About Us: Treasure in the Chest
friendLines.description: They say that in every person's heart is a precious box, into which they place the things they treasure, so that they may guard them for their entire life. My heart harbors many treasures... Care to guess what those might be?

friendLines.title: About the Vision
friendLines.description: When I received my Vision, people in the village kept telling me it was a blessing from Ahmar... but that doesn't matter to me. I swore to protect the village, and I will do it with or without a Vision.

friendLines.title: Something to Share
friendLines.description: I do love spending time in Aaru Village. But each day I spend here is also a reminder that if I ever start to let my guard down... sooner or later, the day may come when I no longer have a life to return to here.

friendLines.title: Interesting Things
friendLines.description: Have you come across Ajilenakh Nuts yet on your journey? They're naturally very sweet, and the villagers make the most delicious candies from them. If you're interested, you should give them a try.

friendLines.title: About Lesser Lord Kusanali
friendLines.description: Perhaps it is a testament to the Dendro Archon's benevolence that I, a descendant of the Al-Ahmar bloodline, am able to live peacefully on this land. If so, I suppose I am grateful for this much, but... I am first and foremost a child of the desert.

friendLines.title: About Layla
friendLines.description: An eccentric girl who always seems to be in a trance...? Yes, I believe I've seen her before — near the Wall of Samiel. I couldn't make sense of what she was saying, nor the calculations she wrote down, but she seemed to be in a much better mood after she'd finished. Perhaps this is her way of relieving stress.

unlockConditions.unlockText: Complete "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

friendLines.title: About Alhaitham
friendLines.description: A truly unusual scholar, unlike any other I've ever met. He sees and thinks about things in his own unique way... I only hope he never wields his sharp mind against the peace of Aaru Village.

friendLines.title: About Cyno
friendLines.description: In the past, it was rare to see the Akademiya's General Mahamatra on this side of the Wall of Samiel, but recently he has been showing up here all the time. I believe that the Eremites have some truly terrifying stories to tell about him...

friendLines.title: About Dehya
friendLines.description: Whenever Dehya brings any of her Eremites to stay at Aaru Village, she always keeps them on their very best behavior. I have to say, it makes my life a lot easier. Ah, Dehya... She might look like trouble at first, but the truth is that she's really quite adorable.

friendLines.title: More About Candace: I
friendLines.description: You want to know more about me? ...I can't promise you a great story, but if you insist... Okay, let's wait until nightfall. We can sit by the fireside and I'll tell you all you wish to know.

friendLines.title: More About Candace: II
friendLines.description: We are a people whose god is no longer with us. Lies pose no threat to us... the threat we face is the prospect of no tomorrow. The path before us is paved with barbs, there is pain in every step — yes, we tread forward clinging to a lie, but perhaps... perhaps there is more virtue in this than in selfishly embracing the truth, and death along with it...

friendLines.title: More About Candace: III
friendLines.description: Even now, there are those who hold on to a belief that King Deshret will be resurrected. But it's not possible. The past is but grains of sand, scattered to the four winds. The best we can do is to let go, and leave the wind to carry them to their final resting place.

friendLines.title: More About Candace: IV
friendLines.description: My shield? Well, according to what people outside the village say, it has the blessing of Bennu. With this shield in hand, all the grains of sand are my eyes and ears, and the desert is ready to do my bidding... Their imaginations can get a little carried away sometimes. But anyway, that aside, the main thing for me is it always works like a charm.

friendLines.title: More About Candace: V
friendLines.description: I'd really love to look into your future with my amber eye, if I could... Something tells me everything would be golden... somewhere between the color of sunlight and honey. A color filled with hope. Your journey will be a smooth road ahead. I give it my blessing.

friendLines.title: Candace's Hobbies
friendLines.description: I always love taking walks in the village. Seeing that all is still well gives me a sense that... if today is just like yesterday, and yesterday is just like all the days before it... things have always been pleasant here, throughout history.

friendLines.title: Candace's Troubles
friendLines.description: Every now and then, a few violent thugs make the mistake of trying to disrupt the peace and tranquility of Aaru Village. I do wonder... is chasing them into a monster-infested valley perhaps a little too... merciful? What do you think, do you have any better ideas on how they should be dealt with?

friendLines.title: Favorite Food
friendLines.description: To me... quantity is more important than taste when it comes to food. Life in the desert uses up more energy than you might think. After a day's work, there's nothing more satisfying than having a filling meal.

friendLines.title: Least Favorite Food
friendLines.description: I don't hate it, but compared to regular meat, eating fish is a real nuisance... Maybe it's because we don't really eat fish here in the desert, but for whatever reason, I'm just not very good at removing all those prickly little bones... This must sound ridiculous to you.

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: I
friendLines.description: Mmm, absolutely delightful! This must have taken a lot of time and effort.

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: II
friendLines.description: For someone who spends so much time on the road, your cooking tastes so... homely.

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: III
friendLines.description: Maybe my definition of "edible" is a little too old-fashioned...

friendLines.title: Birthday
friendLines.description: Happy birthday! It's amazing to think that you were born on this day, years ago in the past. Do you have a birthday wish? If it involves going somewhere dangerous, let me join you — I'll be your guard. Or if you're looking to rest and revitalize, come to Aaru Village, and I'll serve you the finest meats and drinks we have.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
friendLines.description: I feel a newfound strength within me... May it help me to be a better protector.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
friendLines.description: My shield grows sturdier, and my spear sharper. One is an unstoppable force, the other an immovable object... Oh, but... I would never pit these against each other.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
friendLines.description: I learned to wield the spear and shield knowing that I would one day need them, and today I use these skills to protect the village. So perhaps this new strength I now gain in the present is preparing me for trials that lie ahead in the future.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
friendLines.description: I am now capable of venturing ahead of you, and fending off all dangers that would seek to come your way. If you trust me, then I invite you to close your eyes and leave the enemies to me.

actionLines.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
actionLines.description: What do you think? Anything catch your eye?

actionLines.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
actionLines.description: I hope you can find some use for these.

actionLines.title: Joining Party: I
actionLines.description: What's wrong? Are you in danger?

actionLines.title: Joining Party: III
actionLines.description: I promise to keep you safe.
